name: Solo Path
description:
Solo Path
Is an escape game with horror and Urbex themes.
You will play as Ethan, a fan of urban exploration who goes to visit a mysterious abandoned complex.
Unfortunately not everything is going to go as planned and this could well be his last exploration.


Prepare your brain, a paper and a pen, and have your heart set on!


Gameplay
Solo Path is a scripted game in first person view.
The gameplay is based on exploration, collecting clues, solving puzzles and quests.
All in a heavy atmosphere with a scary, evolving and mysterious scenario.
